Users API

The Users API provides full access to manage the users which exist on your account.

Action

The following actions are available. Choose from the list below to view full details of how to access them.

  • List all users

    /api/v1/users/list

    This action will return a list of all users which the authenticated user has access to.

  • Get unit information

    /api/v1/users/show

  • Create a new user

    /api/v1/users/create

    This action will create a new user with the properties which have been provided.

  • Update an existing user

    /api/v1/users/update

    This action will update an existing user with the properties provided.
